Diablo sighed and rolled his main eyes upwards. ::I'm an enemy, bird, 
from my attack haven't you learnt ANYTHING?:: He demanded, then was 
shocked to know he spoke in thoughts. Of course, he didn't have a 
mouth, so mind speak was the only way to go.

With a leap forward, he swung his tail and the scythe blade on it, 
aiming at WindLord's throat. It was so fast he couldn't barely see 
it, as the snap of a bullwhip filled the air.
